DOC.brief_summary: To test whether ivabradine when given in combination with atenolol is able to improve the exercise tolerance of patients with stable angina pectoris
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Ivabradine on Top of Atenolol in Stable Angina Pectoris
DOC.criteria: Chronic stable angina pectoris Documented coronary artery disease Previous treatment with atenolol or other betablocker agent Exercise tolerance test positivity and stability Heart rate < 60 bpm Congestive heart failure
